<object width="320" height="265"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/8MwAkVrCP2U&hl=ru&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/8MwAkVrCP2U&hl=ru&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="320" height="265"></embed></object>


Q: Wtf?
A: yes you read this right, this prefab contains one weapon with unlimited ammo, all other weapons will be usual.


Q: Can i use it in my map? 
A: You can use it as long as you provide me full credit for prefab in your map.


Q: Why did you made this? Unlimited ammo mod exist out there!
A: I made this because it makes only one weapon 'special', and do not depends on server, so you cna use it on any server that runs map with this prefab.


Q: Your vid on youtube is old, why you released this only now.
A: I kepted this method secret for some reason. I made a vid to proove that i really made it.


Q: Is it a cheat?
A: No. It made with pure mapping, no console/cheatengine/1337 hacks used.


Q: Are there any disadvantages?
A: there is slight bug, that if you don't use custom start-round settings, players will start without anything. Just add proper game_player_equip, and profit! :D 


Q: Ty ALOT!
A: Rate 10/10 if you really like it. :)

                         -krassell
